## Brief overview

  Experienced researcher with a demonstrated history of working in the consulting, venture capital, and academia. Skilled in data analysis, public speaking, and content operations. 
  
  Strong business development professional, with a MPH focused in Epidemiology with a certificate in Applied Biostatistics and Health Data Science from Columbia University. 
  
  Also a fashion photographer, documentary filmmaker, and NFT creator in spare time.
  
  There's one principle underlies these seemingly fragmented experiences
  -- “Create through science/business/art, to surpass the limitation of individual's life.”
